pr_title: [#10144] Add remaining example boxes in question section of instructor-help page

timeline.message: added team contribution template & response data

timeline.bodyText:
Does the model need to be with the curvy brackets or would square brackets suffice?

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                              [(instructorCommentTableModel)]="exampleInstructorCommentTableModel">
          
          
            
                              [instructorCommentTableModel]="exampleInstructorCommentTableModel">
